abstract: A Citigroup analyst left a lump of coal for Och-Ziff Capital Management, the hedge fund that went public last month. The analyst, Prashant Bhatia, began covering the fund with a “hold” rating, writing in his research note that Och-Ziff might be facing headwinds for the forseeable future.
lead_paragraph: A Citigroup analyst left a lump of coal for Och-Ziff Capital Management, the hedge fund that went public last month. The analyst, Prashant Bhatia, began covering the fund with a “hold” rating, writing in his research note that Och-Ziff might be facing headwinds for the forseeable future.

headline.main: An Och-Ziff Underwriter Shows Wariness of Stock
